hero.lede: Full-Stack Engineer and SaaS Co-Founder building production-ready software. Co-Creator of Keymint.dev, specializing in secure systems and developer tools.

about.title: About
about.intro: Full-Stack Engineer and SaaS Co-Founder building production-ready software. Co-Creator of Keymint.dev, specializing in secure systems and developer tools.
paragraphs: With 5+ years of experience, I specialize in building secure, scalable SaaS platforms. I created Keymint.dev, a developer-first licensing system serving enterprise users.
I also partner with global clients to deliver high-performance web applications, focusing on clean architecture and optimal user experience.
about.quote: Building software isn't just about writing codeâ€”it's about understanding problems deeply and crafting solutions that stand the test of time.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.intro: Open to new projects and collaborations. Whether you have a product idea or need technical consulting, I'd love to hear from you.

resume.objective: Full-Stack Engineer with 5+ years experience shipping scalable SaaS platforms. Expert in translating business needs into production software.

experience.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Delivered 15+ custom web applications and automation tools to clients in over 5 countries.
Improved client productivity by up to 30% by developing 5+ custom PyQt desktop applications.
Engineered and integrated secure Stripe billing systems for 8+ platforms.
Successfully managed over 20 projects across global time zones, maintaining 100% client satisfaction.
Boosted client organic traffic by an average of 40% through targeted SEO optimizations.

experience.title: Founder & Software Engineer
achievements: Architected a robust licensing backend with a REST API, enabling developers to integrate secure licensing into their applications in minutes.
Developed a vendor dashboard with real-time analytics, providing valuable insights into license activation and usage patterns.
Implemented multiple licensing models (perpetual, subscription, trial) to provide flexible options for software developers.
Designed a self-service customer portal, reducing support overhead and empowering end-users to manage their own licenses.
Ensured high security and reliability, building trust with a growing base of developers.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

achievements: Published open-source GitHub Email Scraper used by 200+ developers
Reduced data collection time by 80% for research teams
